article:
Alice went down the rabbit hole after the White Rabbit. It was a very strange  _ . Alice  _  falling very slowly. She had no time to think and look around her. She could see nothing because it was dark.
Down, down, down.  _ , she was sitting on the ground. She jumped to her  _  and looked around. She could see the White Rabbit. He was  _  saying, "Oh, dear! Oh, dear! I'll be late." Alice ran after him like the wind . She was getting very near  _ .
Now Alice was in a very long, dark room with a door and she could not see the White Rabbit. She tried  to open  the door, but it was locked(, ). Then she saw a little table in the room. On it was a very small key . She looked out of the window into a beautiful garden  _  green trees and bright flowers.
She went back to the table.  _  she saw a little box on the table. She opened it and  found  a very small cake with the words EAT ME on it. Very soon Alice finished the cake.
